Name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
Description: Gentle facial cleanser for normal to dry skin, formulated with ceramides and hyaluronic acid.

Name: Body Shea Milk
Description: A nourishing body lotion enriched with shea butter and milk proteins, designed to deeply hydrate, soften, and soothe the skin.

Name: La Roche-Posay Anthelios Sunscreen SPF 50
Description: Lightweight, broad-spectrum sunscreen with a non-greasy finish for daily use.

Name: The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
Description: High-strength vitamin and mineral blemish formula for clearer skin.

Name: Elemis Dynamic Resurfacing Facial Wash
Description: Skin-smoothing face cleanser that helps purify and gently exfoliate for a renewed complexion.

Name: Heartleaf 77% Soothing Toner
Description: Calming and refreshing toner with 77% Heartleaf extract, designed to care for troubled skin and maintain a pH balance of 5.5.

Name: Leylak Body Oil
Description: Luxurious body oil that nourishes and hydrates the skin, leaving it soft and delicately scented with leylak essence.

Name: Body Lightening Lotion with Snail Extract, Alpha Arbutin, and Collagen
Description: A nourishing body lotion formulated with snail extract, alpha arbutin, and collagen to brighten skin tone, improve elasticity, and provide deep hydration.

Name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel
Description: Refreshing gel moisturizer with hyaluronic acid for intense hydration.

Name: Drunk Elephant T.L.C. Sukari Babyfacial
Description: Powerful exfoliating mask with AHA and BHA to refine and smooth skin texture.

Name: Bioderma Sensibio H2O Micellar Water
Description: Gentle makeup remover and cleanser suitable for sensitive skin.

Name: Alejon Urea Cream
Description: Moisturizing cream formulated with urea to hydrate and soften dry, rough, and cracked skin. Ideal for treating conditions like eczema and psoriasis.

Name: Berrylicious Travel Size Hand & Body Lotion
Description: A fruity-scented, lightweight lotion perfect for on-the-go hydration. Formulated with nourishing ingredients to moisturize and soften both hands and body, leaving a refreshing berry fragrance.

Name: Vitabalm
Description: A nourishing and soothing balm packed with vitamins to hydrate and repair dry, chapped skin. Ideal for use on lips, hands, and other dry areas of the body.

Name: Baby Daily Moisturizer Face&Body
Description: Gentle and hydrating moisturizer designed for the delicate skin of babies. Suitable for both face and body, this formula is free from harsh chemicals, leaving skin soft and nourished.

Name: Natural Moisturizing Factors + HA 100ml
Description: A lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer formulated to replenish the skin's natural moisturizing factors and boost hydration. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and amino acids, it provides lasting moisture and helps maintain the skin's natural barrier, leaving it smooth, soft, and healthy-looking.

Name: Almond Oil Vanilla Fields Body Lotion
Description: A rich and nourishing body lotion infused with almond oil and vanilla, designed to hydrate and soften the skin while leaving a pleasant, long-lasting fragrance.

Name: Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Body Oil
Description: A deeply hydrating body oil enriched with cocoa butter, designed to restore skin's natural radiance and smoothness, leaving it soft and moisturized.

Name: Starville Cleanser
Description: A gentle and effective facial cleanser designed to remove impurities, leaving the skin refreshed and clean.

Name: Leylak Cleansing
Description: An advanced cleansing solution for all skin types, providing deep pore cleansing and hydration.

Name: Bodysplash Vanilla Coconut Eva
Description: A refreshing bodysplash with a tropical vanilla and coconut fragrance, perfect for daily use.

Name: Milk & Honey Body Lotion
Description: A luxurious body lotion infused with milk and honey to nourish and hydrate your skin deeply.

Name: Moisturizing Shower Cream Summer Twist
Description: A rich shower cream with a refreshing summer scent that cleanses and moisturizes your skin.

Name: Dermaelle Hyaluwhite Face
Description: A luxurious cream designed to brighten and hydrate the skin on the face and neck. Infused with Hyaluronic Acid and Whitening agents, it helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines, leaving the skin looking smooth, firm, and radiant.

Name: Heartleaf 70% Intense Calming Cream 50ml
Description: A soothing and hydrating cream formulated with 70% Heartleaf extract to calm sensitive skin and provide intense hydration. Perfect for reducing redness and irritation while keeping the skin moisturized and nourished.

Name: Vanilla Lace Body Mist
Description: An enchanting body mist with a captivating vanilla fragrance to leave you feeling fresh all day.
